sections.text: a~ggi#rasOq vai saqtramA#sata | tEShAqM pRuSni#r-GarmaqdhugA#sIt | sarjIqShENA#jIvat | tE$&bruvann | kasmaiq nu saqtramA$smahE | yE$&syA OSha#dhIqrna jaqnayA#maq iti# | tE diqvO vRuShTi#-masRujanta | yAva#ntaH stOqkA aqvApa#dyanta | tAva#tIqrOSha#dhayO &jAyanta || tA jAqtAH piqtarO# viqShENA#limpann | 1 (10)

tAsA$M jaqgdhvA rupyaqntyait | tE$&bruvann | ka iqdamiqttha-ma#kaqriti# | vaqyaM BA#gaqdhEya#-miqcCamA#nAq iti# piqtarO$&bruvann | kiM ~MvO# BAgaqdhEyaqmiti# | aqgniqhOqtra Eqva nO&pyaqstvitya#-bruvann | tEBya# Eqtad-BA#gaqdhEyaqM prAya#cCann | yaddhuqtvA niqmArShTi# | tatOq vai ta OSha#dhIra-svadayann || ya EqvaM ~MvEda# | 2 (10)

svada#ntE&smAq OSha#dhayaH | tE vaqthsamuq-pAvA#sRujann | iqdaM nO# haqvyaM pradA#paqyEti# | sO$&bravIqdvara#M ~MvRuNai | daSa# mAq rAtrI$rjAqtaM na dO#hann | Aqsaq~ggaqvaM mAqtrA saqha ca#rAqNIti# | tasmA$d-vaqthsaM jAqtaM daSaq rAtrIqrna du#hanti | Aqsaq~ggaqvaM mAqtrA saqha cara#ti | vArE#vRutaq(gg)qhya#sya | tasmA$d-vaqthsa(gm) sa(gm)#sRuShTadhaqya(gm) ruqdrO GAtu#kaH ( ) | atiq hi saqndhAM dhaya#ti || 3 (11) 2.1.2 anuvAkaM 2 - agnihOtranirUpaNam

praqjApa#ti-raqgni-ma#sRujata | taM praqjA anva#sRujyanta | tama#BAqga upA$sta | sO$&sya praqjABiq-rapA$krAmat | tama#vaqruru#th-samAqnO&nvai$t | tama#vaqrudhaqM nASa#knOt | sa tapO# &tapyata | sO$&gni-rupA#ramaqtAtA#piq vai sya praqjApa#tiqriti# | sa raqrATAqduda#mRuShTa | 4 (9)

tad-GRuqtama#Bavat | tasmAqdyasya# dakShiNaqtaH kESAq unmRu#ShTAH | tAM jyE$ShThalaqkShmI prA#jApaqtyEtyA#huH | yad-raqrATA#duqdamRu#ShTa | tasmA$d-raqrATEq kESAq na sa#nti | tadaqgnau prAgRu#hNAt | tadvya#cikiqthsat | juqhavAqnI(3) mA hauqShA(3)miti# | tad-vi#cikiqthsAyaiq janma# || ya EqvaM ~MviqdvAn. vi#ciqkithsa#ti | 5 (10)

vasI#ya Eqva cE#tayatE || taM ~MvAgaqBya#vada-jjuqhudhIti# | sO$&bravIt | kastvamaqsIti# | svaiva tEq vAgitya#bravIt | sO#&juhOqth-svAhEti# | tathsvA#hAkAqrasyaq janma# || ya Eqva(gg) svA#hAkAqrasyaq janmaq vEda# | kaqrOti# svAhAkAqrENa# vIqrya$m || yasyaiqvaM ~MviqduSha#H svAhAkAqrENaq juhva#ti | 6 (10)

BOgA#yaiqvAsya# huqtaM Ba#vati || tasyAq Ahu#tyaiq puru#Sha-masRujata | dviqtIya#-majuhOt | sO&Sva#-masRujata | tRuqtIya#-majuhOt | sa gA#masRujata | caqtuqrtha-ma#juhOt | sO&vi#masRujata | paq~jcaqma-ma#juhOt | sO#&jAma#sRujata | 7 (10)

sO$&gni-ra#biBEt | Ahu#tIBiqrvai mA$&&pnOqtIti# | sa praqjApa#tiqM punaqH prAvi#Sat | taM praqjApa#ti-rabravIt | jAyaqsvEti# | sO$&bravIt | kiM BA#gaqdhEya#maqBi ja#niShyaq iti# | tuBya#mEqvEda(gm) hU#yAtAq itya#bravIt | sa Eqtad-BA#gaqdhEya#maqBya#jAyata | yada#gnihOqtram | 8 (10)

tasmA#dagnihOqtra-mu#cyatE || taddhUqyamA#na-mAdiqtyO$&bravIt | mA hau#ShIH | uqBayOqrvai-nA#vEqtaditi# | sO$&gni-ra#bravIt | kaqthaM nau# hOShyaqntIti# | sAqyamEqva tuBya#M juqhavann# | prAqtarmahyaq-mitya#bravIt | tasmA#daqgnayE# sAqya(gm) hU#yatE | sUryA#ya prAqtaH || 9 (10)

AqgnEqyI vai rAtri#H | aiqndramaha#H | yadanu#ditEq sUryE$ prAqtarju#huqyAt | uqBaya#mEqvAgnEqya(gg) syA$t | udi#tEq sUryE$ prAqtarju#hOti | tathAq&gnayE# sAqya(gm) hU#yatE | sUryA#ya prAqtaH || rAtriqM ~MvA anu# praqjAH pra jA#yantE | ahnAq prati# tiShThanti | yathsAqyaM juqhOti# | 10 (10)

praiva tEna# jAyatE | udi#tEq sUryE$ prAqtar-ju#hOti | pratyEqva tEna# tiShThati || praqjApa#tira-kAmayataq prajA#yEqyEti# | sa Eqtada#gnihOqtraM mi#thuqna-ma#paSyat | tadudi#tEq sUryE#&juhOt | yaju#ShAq &nyat | tUqShNImaqnyat | tatOq vai sa prAjA#yata | yasyaiqvaM ~MviqduShaq udi#tEq sUryE$&gnihOqtraM juhva#ti | 11 (10)

praiva jA#yatE | athOq yathAq divA$ prajAqnannEti# | tAqdRugEqva tat || athOq KalvA#huH | yasyaq vai dvau puNyau# gRuqhE vasa#taH | yastayO#raqnya(gm) rAqdhaya#tyaqnyaM na | uqBau vAva sa tAvRu#cCaqtIti# | aqgniM ~MvAvAdiqtyaH sAqyaM pravi#Sati | tasmA#daqgnirdUqrAnnakta#M dadRuSE | uqBE hi tEja#sI saqpaMdyE#tE | 12 (10)

uqdyantaqM ~MvAvAdiqtya-maqgniranu# saqmArO#hati | tasmA$ddhUqma EqvAgnErdivA# dadRuSE | yadaqgnayE# sAqyaM ju#huqyAt | A sUryA#ya vRuScyEta | yathsUryA#ya prAqtar-ju#huqyAt | A&gnayE# vRuScyEta | dEqvatA$ByaH saqmada#M daddhyAt | aqgnirjyOtiqr-jyOtiqH sUryaqH svAhEtyEqva sAqya(gm) hO#taqvya$m | sUryOq jyOtiqr jyOti#raqgniH svAhEti# prAqtaH | tathOqBAByA(gm)# sAqya(gm) hU#yatE | 13 (10)

uqBAByA$M prAqtaH | na dEqvatA$ByaH saqmada#M dadhAti || aqgnirjyOtiqrityA#ha | aqgnirvai rE#tOqdhAH || praqjA jyOtiqrityA#ha | praqjA EqvAsmaiq pra ja#nayati || sUryOq jyOtiqrityA#ha | praqjAsvEqva prajA#tAsuq rEtO# dadhAti || jyOti#raqgniH svAhEtyA#ha | praqjA Eqva prajA#tA aqsyAM prati#ShThApayati || 14 (10)

tUqShNImutta#rAq-mAhu#tiM juhOti | miqthuqnaqtvAyaq prajA$tyai || yadudi#tEq sUryE$ prAqtar-ju#huqyAt | yathA&ti#thayEq pradru#tAya SUqnyAyA#vasaqthA-yA#hAqrya(gm)# hara#nti | tAqdRugEqva tat | kvAhaq tataqstad-BavaqtItyA#huH | yathsa na vEda# | yasmaiq taddharaqntIti# | tasmAqd-yadau#ShaqsaM juqhOti# | tadEqva sa#praqMti ( ) | athOq yathAq prArtha#mauShaqsaM pa#riq vEvE$ShTi | tAqdRugEqva tat || 15 (12) (aqmRuqShTaq - viqciqkithsa#tiq - juhva# - tyaqjAma#sRuja - tAgnihOqtra(gm) - sUryA#ya prAqtar - juqhOtiq - juhva#ti - saqMpadyE#tE - hUyatE - sthApayati - saMpraqti dvE ca#) (A2) 2.1.3 anuvAkaM 3 - upayOkShyamANasya haviShaH saMskAraH

ruqdrO vA EqShaH | yadaqgniH | patnI$ sthAqlI | yanmaddhyEq&gnE-ra#dhiqSrayE$t | ruqdrAyaq patnIqmapi# daddhyAt | praqmAyu#kA syAt | udIqcO&~ggA#rAnniqrUhyAdhi# Srayati | patni#yai gOpIqthAya# || vya#ntAn karOti | tathAq patnya-pra#mAyukA Bavati || 16 (10)

GaqrmO vA EqShO&SA$ntaH | aha#rahaqH pravRu#jyatE | yada#gnihOqtram | prati#Shi~jcEt paqSukA#masya | SAqntami#vaq hi pa#Saqvya$m || na prati#Shi~jcEd-brahmavarcaqsakA#masya | sami#ddhamivaq hi bra#hmavarcaqsam || athOq Kalu# | praqtiqShicya#mEqva | yat-pra#tiShiq~jcati# | 17 (10)

tat-pa#Saqvya$m | yajjuqhOti# | tadbra#hmavarcaqsi | uqBaya#mEqvAka#H || pracyu#taqM ~MvA EqtadaqsmA-llOqkAt | aga#taM dEvalOqkam | yacCRuqta(gm) haqvirana#BiGAritam | aqBidyO#tayati | aqByE#vaina#dGArayati | athO# dEvaqtraivaina#d-gamayati || 18 (10)

parya#gni karOti | rakSha#sAq-mapa#hatyai || triH parya#gni karOti | tryA#vRuqddhi yaqj~jaH | athO# mEddhyaqtvAya# || yat-prAqcIna#-mudvAqsayE$t | yaja#mAna(gm) SuqcA &rpa#yEt | yad-da#kShiqNA | piqtRuqdEqvaqtya(gg)# syAt | yat-praqtyak | 19 (10)

patnI(gm)# SuqcA &rpa#yEt | uqdIqcInaq-mudvA#sayati | EqShA vai dE#vamanuqShyANA(gm)# SAqntA dik | tAmEqvainaqdanUd-vA#sayatiq SAntyai$ || vartma# karOti | yaqj~jasyaq saMta#tyai || niShTa#pati | upaiqva tathstRu#NAti || caqturunna#yati | catu#ShpAdaH paqSava#H | 20 (10)

paqSUnEqvA-va#rundhE || sarvA$n-pUqrNAnunna#yati | sarvEq hi puNyA# rAqddhAH || aqnUcaq unna#yati | praqjAyA# anUcInaqtvAya# | aqnUcyEqvAsya# praqjA &rddhu#kA Bavati || saM mRu#Satiq vyAvRu#ttyai || nAhO$Shyaqnnupa# sAdayEt | yadahO$Shyannupa sAqdayE$t | yathAq &nyasmA# upaniqdhAya# | 21 (10)

aqnyasmai$ praqyacCa#ti | tAqdRugEqva tat | A&smai# vRuScyEta | yadEqva gAr.ha#patyE&dhiqSraya#ti | tEnaq gAr.ha#patyaM prINAti || aqgnira#biBEt | Ahu#tayOq mA&tyE$ShyaqntIti# | sa EqtA(gm) saqmidha#-mapaSyat | tAmA&dha#tta | tatOq vA aqgnAvAhu#tayO&ddhriyanta | 22 (10)

yadE#na(gm) saqmaya#cCat | tathsaqmidha#H samiqttvam | saqmidhaqmAda#dhAti | samEqvaina#M ~MyacCati | Ahu#tInAqM dhRutyai$ | athO# agnihOqtramEqvEddhmava#t-karOti | Ahu#tInAqM prati#ShThityai || braqhmaqvAqdinO# vadanti | yadEkA(gm)# saqmidha#mAqdhAyaq dvE Ahu#tI juqhOti# | athaq kasyA(gm)# saqmidhi# dviqtIyAq-mAhu#tiM juhOqtIti# | 23 (10)

yad-dvE saqmidhA#vAdaqddhyAt | BrAtRu#vyamasmai janayEt | EkA(gm)# saqmidha#mAqdhAya# | yaju#ShAq &nyAmAhu#tiM juhOti | uqBE Eqva saqmidva#tIq Ahu#tI juhOti | nAsmaiq BrAtRu#vyaM janayati || AdI$ptAyAM juhOti | sami#ddhamivaq hi bra#hmavarcaqsam | athOq yathA&ti#thiqM jyOti#ShkRuqtvA pa#riqvEvE$ShTi | tAqdRugEqva tat ( ) || caqturunna#yati | dvirju#hOti | tasmA$d-dviqpA-ccatu#ShpAdamatti | athO$ dviqpadyEqva catu#ShpadaqH prati#ShThApayati || 24 (14) 2.1.4 anuvAkaM 4 - upayuktasya haviShaH saMskAraH

uqttaqrAva#tIqM ~Mvai dEqvA Ahu#tiqmaju#havuH | avA#cIqmasu#rAH | tatO# dEqvA aBa#vann | parA&su#rAH | yaM kAqmayE#taq vasI#yAnth syAqditi# | kanI#yaqstasyaq pUrva(gm)# huqtvA | utta#raqM BUyO# juhuyAt | EqShA vA u#ttaqrAvaqtyAhu#tiH | tAM dEqvA a#juhavuH | tataqstE#&Bavann | 25 (10)

yasyaiqvaM juhva#ti | Bava#tyEqva || yaM kAqmayE#taq pApI#yAnth syAqditi# | BUyaqstasyaq pUrva(gm)# huqtvA | utta#raqM kanI#yO juhuyAt | EqShA vA avAqcyAhu#tiH | tAmasu#rA ajuhavuH | tataqstE parA#&Bavann | yasyaiqvaM juhva#ti | paraiqva Ba#vati || 26 (10)

huqtvOpa# sAdayaqtyajA#mitvAya | athOq vyAvRu#ttyai || gAr.ha#patyaqM pratI$kShatE | ana#nuddhyAyina-mEqvaina#M karOti || aqgniqhOqtrasyaq vai sthAqNura#sti | taM ~Mya RuqcCEt | yaqj~jaqsthAqNumRu#cCEt | EqSha vA a#gnihOqtrasya# sthAqNuH | yat-pUrvA&&hu#tiH | tAM ~Myadutta#rayAq&Bi ju#huqyAt | 27 (10)

yaqj~jaqsthAqNu-mRu#cCEt | aqtiqhAyaq pUrvAqmAhu#tiM juhOti | yaqj~jaqsthAqNumEqva pari# vRuNakti | athOq BrAtRu#vyamEqvAptvA &ti#krAmati || aqvAqcIna(gm)# sAqyamupa# mArShTi | rEta# Eqva tad-da#dhAti | UqrddhvaM prAqtaH | pra ja#nayatyEqva tat || braqhmaqvAqdinO# vadanti | caqturunna#yati | 28 (10)

dvirju#hOti | athaq kva# dvE Ahu#tI Bavataq iti# | aqgnau vai$SvAnaqra iti# brUyAt | EqSha vA aqgnirvai$SvAnaqraH | yadbrA$hmaqNaH | huqtvA dviH prASnA#ti | aqgnAvEqva vai$SvAnaqrE dvE Ahu#tI juhOti || dvirjuqhOti# | dvirnimA$rShTi | dviH prASnA#ti | 29 (10)

ShaTth saMpa#dyantE | ShaDvA Ruqtava#H | RuqtUnEqva prI#NAti | braqhmaqvAqdinO# vadanti | kiqM dEqvaqtya#-magnihOqtramiti# | vaiqSvaqdEqvamiti# brUyAt | yad-yaju#ShA juqhOti# | tadai$ndrAqgnam | yat-tUqShNIm | tat-prA#jApaqtyam | 30 (10)

yanniqmArShTi# | tadOSha#dhInAm | yaddviqtIya$m | tat-pi#tRuqNAm | yat-prASnA#ti | tad-garBA#NAm | tasmAqd-garBAq ana#SnantO varddhantE | yadAqcAma#ti | tanma#nuqShyA#NAm || uda#~gparyAqvRutyAcA#mati | 31 (10)

AqtmanO# gOpIqthAya# || nirNE#nEktiq Suddhyai$ || niShTa#pati svaqgAkRu#tyai | ud-di#Sati | saqptaqr.qShInEqva prI#NAti || daqkShiqNA paqryAva#rtatE | svamEqva vIqrya#manu# paqryAva#rtatE | tasmAqd-dakShiqNO&rddha# AqtmanO# vIqryA#vattaraH | athO# AdiqtyasyaiqvAvRutaqmanu# paqryAva#rtatE || huqtvOpaq sami#ndhE | 32 (10)

braqhmaqvaqrcaqsasyaq sami#ddhyai || na baqraq.hiranuq pra ha#rEt | asa(gg)#sthitOq vA EqSha yaqj~jaH | yada#gnihOqtram | yada#nu praqharE$t | yaqj~jaM ~MvicCi#ndyAt | tasmAqnnAnu# praqhRutya$m | yaqj~jasyaq santa#tyai || aqpO ni na#yati | aqvaqBRuqthasyaiqva rUqpama#kaH ( ) || 33 (10) 2.1.5 anuvAkaM 5 - kAmyAni hOmadravyANi

braqhmaqvAqdinO# vadanti | aqgniqhOqtraprA#yaNA yaqj~jAH | kiM prA#yaNa-magnihOqtramiti# | vaqthsO vA a#gnihOqtrasyaq prAya#Nam | aqgniqhOqtraM ~Myaj~jAnA$m || tasya# pRuthiqvI sada#H | aqntari#kShaq-mAgnI$ddhram | dyaur.-ha#viqrddhAna$m | diqvyA ApaqH prOkSha#NayaH | OSha#dhayO baqraq.hiH | 34 (10)

vanaqspata#ya iqddhmaH | diSa#H pariqdhaya#H | AqdiqtyO yUpa#H | yaja#mAnaH paqSuH | saqmuqdrO#&vaBRuqthaH | saqm~MvaqthsaqraH sva#gAkAqraH | tasmAqdAhi#tAgnEqH sarva#mEqva ba#rhiqShya#M daqttaM Ba#vati | yath sAqyaM juqhOti# | rAtri#mEqva tEna# dakShiqNyA$M kurutE | yat-prAqtaH | 35 (10)

aha#rEqva tEna# dakShiqNya#M kurutE | yat-tatOq dadA#ti | sA dakShi#NA || yAva#ntOq vai dEqvA ahu#taqmAdann# | tE parA#&Bavann | ta Eqtada#gnihOqtra(gm) sarva#syaiqva sa#mavaqdAyA#juhavuH | tasmA#dAhuH | aqgniqhOqtraM ~Mvai dEqvA gRuqhANAqM niShkRu#ti-mapaSyaqnniti# | yath-sAqyaM juqhOti# | rAtri#yA Eqva taddhuqtAdyA#ya | 36 (10)

yaja#mAnaqsyA-pa#rABAvAya | yat-prAqtaH | ahna# Eqva taddhuqtAdyA#ya | yaja#mAnaqsyA-pa#rABAvAya | yat-tatOq&SnAti# | huqtamEqva tat || dvayOqH paya#sA juhuyAt-paqSukA#masya | EqtadvA a#gnihOqtraM mi#thuqnam | ya EqvaM ~MvEda# | pra praqjayA# paqSuBi#r-mithuqnair-jA#yatE | 37 (10)

iqmAmEqva pUrva#yA duqhE | aqmUmutta#rayA | aqdhiqSrityOtta#raqmA na#yati | yOnA#vEqva tad-rEta#H si~jcati praqjana#nE || AjyE#na juhuyAqt-tEja#skAmasya | tEjOq vA Ajya$m | tEqjaqsvyE#va Ba#vati | paya#sA paqSukA#masya | Eqtadvai pa#SUqnA(gm) rUqpam | rUqpENaiqvAsmai# paqSUnava# rundhE | 38 (10)

paqSuqmAnEqva Ba#vati | daqddhnEndriqya kA#masya | iqndriqyaM ~Mvai dadhi# | iqndriqyAqvyE#va Ba#vati | yaqvAqgvA$ grAma#kAmasyauShaqdhA vai ma#nuqShyA$H | BAqgaqdhEyE#naiqvAsmai# sajAqtAnava#-rundhE | grAqmyE#va Ba#vati || aya#j~jOq vA EqShaH | yO#sAqmA | 39 (9)

caqturunna#yati | catu#rakShara(gm) rathantaqram | raqthaqntaqrasyaiqSha varNa#H | uqparI#va harati | aqntari#kShaM ~MvAmadEqvyam | vAqmaqdEqvyasyaiqSha varNa#H | dvirju#hOti | dvya#kSharaM bRuqhat | bRuqhaqta EqSha varNa#H | aqgniqhOqtramEqva tath sAma#nvat-karOti || 40 (10)

yO vA a#gnihOqtrasyO#paqsadOq vEda# | upai#namupaqsadO# namanti | viqndata# upasaqttAra$m | uqnnIyOpa# sAdayati | pRuqthiqvImEqva prI#NAti | hOqShyannupa# sAdayati | aqntari#kShamEqva prI#NAti | huqtvOpa# sAdayati | diva#mEqva prI#NAti | EqtA vA a#gnihOqtrasyO#paqsada#H | 41 (10)

ya EqvaM ~MvEda# | upai#na-mupaqsadO# namanti | viqndata# upasaqttAra$m || yO vA a#gnihOqtrasyASrA#vitaM praqtyASrA#vitaq(gm)q hOtA#raM braqhmANa#M ~MvaShaTkAqraM ~MvEda# | tasyaq tvE#va huqtam | prAqNO vA a#gnihOqtrasyASrA#vitam | aqpAqnaH praqtyASrA#vitam | manOq hOtA$ | cakShu#r-braqhmA | niqmEqShO va#ShaTkAqraH | 42 (10)

ya EqvaM ~MvEda# | tasyaq tvE#va huqtam || sAqyaqM ~MyAvA#naScaq vai dEqvAH prA#taqryAvA#NaScA-gnihOqtriNO# gRuqhamAga#cCanti | tAn. yanna taqrpayE$t | praqjayA$&sya paqSuBiqrvi ti#ShThErann | yattaqrpayE$t | tRuqptA E#naM praqjayA# paqSuBi#starpayEyuH || saqjUrdEqvaiH sAqyaM ~MyAva#Biqriti# sAqya(gm) saM mRu#Sati | saqjUrdEqvaiH prAqtaryAva#Biqriti# prAqtaH | yE caiqva dEqvAH sA#yaqM ~MyAvA#nOq yE ca# prAtaqryAvA#NaH | 43 (10)

A&prAq dyAvA#pRuthiqvI aqntari#kSham | sUrya# AqtmA jaga#tastaqsthuSha#Sca || "tvaShTAq dadhaqt {98}, "tanna#-stuqrIpa$m {99}" | "tvaShTA# vIqraM {100}" "piqSa~gga#rUpaH {101}" || daSEqmaM tvaShTu#rjanayantaq garBa$m | ata#ndrAsO yuvaqtayOq biBa#rtram | tiqgmAnI#kaq(gg)q svaya#SasaqM janE#Shu | viqrOca#mAnaqM pari#ShIM nayanti || AviShTyO# varddhatEq cAru#rAsu | jiqhmAnA#mUqrddhvaH svaya#SA uqpasthE$ | 52 (10)

hiqraqNyayOq vRuSha#BiryAqtvaSvai$H | GRuqtava#rtaniH paqviBI# rucAqnaH | iqShAM ~MvOqDhA nRuqpati#rvAqjinI#vAn || sa pa#prathAqnO aqBi pa~jcaq BUma# | triqvaqndhuqrO manaqsA&&yA#tu yuqktaH | viSOq yEnaq gacCa#thO dEvaqyantI$H | kutrA# ciqdyAma#maSvinAq dadhA#nA || svaSvA# yaqSasA&&yA#tamaqrvAk | dasrA# niqdhiM madhu#mantaM pibAthaH | vi vAq(gm)q rathO# vaqddhvA# yAda#mAnaH | 55 (10)

udU#hathuqrarNa#sOq asri#dhAnaiH | paqtaqtriBi#-raSraqmai-ra#vyaqthiBi#H | daq(gm)qsanA#BiraSvinA pAqraya#ntA || agnI#ShOmAq yO aqdya vA$m | iqdaM ~Mvaca#H sapaqryati# | tasmai# dhatta(gm) suqvIrya$m | gavAqM pOShaq(gg)q svaSvi#yaM || yO aqgnIShOmA# haqviShA# sapaqryAt | dEqvaqdrIcAq mana#sAq yO GRuqtEna# | tasya# vraqta(gm) ra#kShataM pAqtama(gm)ha#saH | 57 (10)

viqSE janA#yaq mahiq Sarma# yacCatam || agnI#ShOmAq ya Ahu#tim | yO vAqM dASA$ddhaqviShkRu#tim | sa praqjayA# suqvIrya$m | viSvaqmAyuqr-vya#Snavat || agnI#ShOmAq cEtiq tad-vIqrya#M ~MvAm | yadamu#ShNItamavaqsaM paqNiM gOH | avA#tirataqM pratha#yasyaq SESha#H | avi#ndataqM jyOtiqrEka#M baqhuBya#H || "agnI#ShOmAviqma(gm) sumE {104}" "&gnI#ShOmA haqviShaqH prasthi#tasya ( ) {105}" || 58 (10) (jaqBAqraq - dyau - raqgnE - ruqpastha# - upaqkShyantO# - badbadhAqnO-yAda#mAnaH - samuqdrE - &(gm)ha#saqH - prasthi#tasya) (A7) 2.8.8 anuvAkaM 8 - vEhadAdipaSUnAM sUktAni

aqhama#smi prathamaqjA Ruqtasya# | pUrva#M dEqvEByO# aqmRuta#syaq nABi#H | yO mAq dadA#tiq sa idEqva mA vA$H | aqha-mannaq-manna#-maqdanta#madmi || pUrva#-maqgnErapi# dahaqtyanna$M | yaqttau hA#&&sAtE ahamuttaqrEShu# | vyAtta#masya paqSava#H suqjaMBa$M | paSya#ntiq dhIrAqH praca#rantiq pAkA$H || jahA$myaqnyaM na ja#hAmyaqnyaM | aqhamannaqM ~MvaSaqmicca#rAmi | 59 (10)

saqmAqnamarthaqM paryE#mi BuqMjat | kO mAmanna#M manuqShyO# dayEta || parA#kEq annaqM nihi#taM ~MlOqka Eqtat | viSvai$r-dEqvaiH piqtRuBi#r-guqptamanna$M | yadaqdyatE# luqpyatEq yat pa#rOqpyatE$ | SaqtaqtaqmI sA taqnUrmE# baBUva || maqhAntau# caqrU sa#kRud-duqgdhEna# paprau | diva#~jcaq pRuS~ji# pRuthiqvIM ca# sAqkaM | tath saqMpiba#ntOq na mi#nanti vEqdhasa#H | naitad-BUyOq Bava#tiq nO kanI#yaH || 60 (10)

anna#M prAqNa-manna#-mapAqna-mA#huH | anna#M mRuqtyuM tamu# jIqvAtu#mAhuH | anna#M braqhmANO# jaqrasa#M ~Mvadanti | anna#mAhuH praqjana#naM praqjAnA$M || mOGaqmanna#M vindatEq apra#cEtAH | saqtyaM bra#vImi vaqdha ithsa tasya# | nAryaqmaNaqM puShya#tiq nO saKA#yaM | kEva#lAGO Bavati kEvalAqdI || aqhaM mEqGaH staqnayaqn. var.Sha#nnasmi | mAma#dantyaqhama#dmyaqnyAn | 61 (10)

aqha(gm) sadaqmRutO# BavAmi | madA#diqtyA adhiq sarvE# tapanti || "dEqvIM ~MvAca#majanayantaq {106}, "yad-vAg-vada#nti {107}" || aqnaqntA-mantAqdadhiq nirmi#tAM maqhIM | yasyA$M dEqvA a#dadhuqr BOja#nAni | EkA$kSharAM dviqpadAq(gm)q ShaTpa#dA~jca | vAca#M dEqvA upa#jIvantiq viSvE$ || vAca#M dEqvA upa#jIvantiq viSvE$ | vAca#M gandhaqrvAH paqSavO# manuqShyA$H | vAqcImA viSvAq Buva#nAqnyarpi#tA | 62 (10)

sA nOq hava#M juShatAq-mindra#patnI || vAgaqkShara#M prathamaqjA Ruqtasya# | vEdA#nAM mAqtA-&mRuta#syaq nABi#H | sA nO# juShAqNOpa# yaqj~jamAgA$t | ava#ntI dEqvI suqhavA# mE astu || yA mRuSha#yO mantraqkRutO# manIqShiNa#H | aqnvaicCa#n dEqvA-stapa#sAq SramE#Na | tAM dEqvIM ~MvAca(gm)# haqviShA# yajAmahE | sA nO# dadhAtu sukRuqtasya# lOqkE || caqtvAriq vAk pari#mitA paqdAni# | 63 (10)

brahma# saqmid-Ba#vaqtyAhu#tInAM || A gAvO# agmannuqta Baqdrama#krann | sIda#ntu gOqShThE raqNaya#ntvaqsmE | praqjAva#tIH puruqrUpA# iqha syuH | indrA#ya pUqrvI ruqShasOq duhA#nAH || indrOq yajva#nE pRuNaqtE ca# SikShati | upEdda#dAtiq na svaM mu#ShAyati | BUyO# BUyO raqyimida#sya vaqrddhayann# | aBi#nnE KiqllE nida#dhAti dEvaqyuM || "na tA na#Santiq {108}", "na tA arvA$ {109}" || 69 (10)
